nodes.name: withdraw

activateEvent(uint256).details: It can be only called by the Event Owners.

createEvent(string,string,string,string,.details: It can be only called by anyone.

params._eventDate: Date and Time of the Event in epoch format
params._stake: Amount to be Staked for Registration

deactivateEvent(uint256).details: It can be only called by the Event Owners.

eventAttendance(uint256,address).details: It can be only called by Event Owners Only and Attendee should have bought ticket

params._attendee: Address of the Person who Attended the Meetup

finishEvent(uint256).details: It can be only called by the Event Owners.

getEventDetails(uint256).details: It can be only called by the Registered Halls.

params._eventCount: The Event ID whoose details has to be viewed

getEventDetails(uint256).return: Event IDEvent OwnerEvent OwnerEvent DescriptionEvent Image IPFS HashEvent Location Physical AddressDate and Time of the Event in epoch formatSeats LeftStake AmountPrice per Ticket

getEventIncome(uint256).details: It can be only called by anyone.
getEventIncome(uint256).return: Income of the event in wei

isEventActive(uint256).details: It can be only called by anyone.
isEventActive(uint256).return: True for Event Active and False for Event not Active

isEventFinished(uint256).details: It can be only called by anyone.
isEventFinished(uint256).return: True for Event Finished and False for Event not Finished

register(uint256).details: It can be only called by anyone and is Payable

retStake(uint256).details: It can be only called by Event Owner after event is finished

stakeAndRegister(uint256).details: It can be only called by anyone and is Payable

verifyReg(uint256,address).details: It can be only called by anyone.
verifyReg(uint256,address).return: True if they have ticket and False if they don't have ticket

withdraw().details: It can be only called by anyone.

withdrawFromEvent(uint256).details: It can be only called by Event Owner. The event should be finished before calling this.
